result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rashad Marquis Gooden

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Witness List, received and filed
State's Witness List, received and filed.
State's Motions in Limine, received and filed.

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Jude in court for Rashad Marquis Gooden.  Attorney Ryan Jay Michaels in court for State of Wisconsin. 
MATTER HEARD OFF THE RECORD. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 11/7/22 at 8:30 am in Branch 29.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring with a 24 hour curfew. No alternative bail. Defendant to REMAIN IN CUSTODY until a device becomes available. Court orders previous conditions to remain in full force and effect.

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Jude appeared by video for Rashad Marquis Gooden.  Attorney Ryan Jay Michaels appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Bail Bond Hearing. Defendant not produced. Arguments heard as to bail. Court sets cash bond with other non-monetary conditions to remain. Case remains calendared for Final Pre-Trial and Jury Trial dates.
to modify bail, filed.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND. Expires: 11/15/22

Attorney Michael Jude in court, defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden not in court, in custody.  Katie Bakunowicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held. Defense requests a bail/bond hearing,  Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Letter from defendant.  (Rashad M. Gooden - #2022004866, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail. (Rashad M. Gooden - #2022004866, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Motion to Dismiss.  (Rashad M. Gooden - #2022004866, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in court by video with Attorney Michael Jude who appears in person.  Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officers J. Gainer & J. Carlson. Court took judicial notice of 08JV1340 & 20CF1187. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is in custody. Preliminary hearing on 7/29/22 at 9:00 am moved back to 7/15/22 at 8:30 in preliminary hearing court. Parties notified.
Case set for a preliminary hearing on 7/15/22 at 8:30 am. Due to the Court's calendar, case is rescheduled to 7/29/22 at 9:00 am. Parties notified.

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in court with Attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. Defense moves to dismiss; motion is denied. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility. Defense to be heard on bail on the next date.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in court.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a motion hearing.   Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Court holds colloquy with defendant. Defendant advises the Court that Attorney Michael Jude was going to be appointed to represent him. Court takes no action on the defendant's motion to proceed pro se. Court finds CAUSE to adjourn the preliminary hearing. Case passed. 

CASE RECALLED. Attorney Michael Jude appears on behalf of the defendant. Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court sets a preliminary hearing in preliminary hearing court.  Case is adjourned to Br. PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 29
Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in court, in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Defendant has filed a motion to proceed pro-se. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Motion Hearing in trial court.  Motion hearing scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Pre-Trial Motion to Proceed Pro Se.  (Rashad M. Gooden - #2022004866, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden not in court, defendant in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed Counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with S.L.G
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Rashad Marquis Gooden in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rashad Marquis Gooden appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer Branch 29.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings. Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 8. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.   
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
